attributes.action: Why is the Government destroying the Royal Navy?
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to stop destroying the RN and increase spending on the Navy,especially the Aircraft Carriers which will take 10-20 years to reach the optimum sortie ability after they get the aircraft, will only be able to be at sea 150-200 days of the year, be designed like the American carriers because they want to further intergrate the two navies and the plane they want to buy are different to those they wanted and are American made. The Royal Navy is being destroyed because the government just because they want to save money.
